metadata.titleEn: HiWATER: Dataset of differential GPS in the middle and upper reaches of the Heihe River Basin (2012)
metadata.titleCn: 黑河生态水文遥感试验：黑河流域中上游差分GPS定位测量数据集
metadata.description:
The purpose of differential GPS positioning survey is to unify multiple survey areas into the same coordinate system and realize accurate absolute positioning through joint survey with national high-level control point coordinates. Under the national geodetic coordinate system of 2000, the accurate positioning of flux observation matrix, hulugou small watershed, tianmuchi small watershed and dayokou watershed and target is completed. In order to realize the geometric correction and absolute positioning of optical image, SAR image and airborne lidar data, the layout of ground control points and high-precision measurement are completed. In the middle reaches of the area, one national high-level control point is jointly surveyed in the five directions of East, South, West, North and middle.            Measuring instrument:            
There are 3 sets of triple R8 GNSS system.            
Measurement principle:            
For the control network encryption point, it is connected with the high-level known points in four quadrants around the survey area and distributed evenly in the survey area. For the ground control point (GCP), the obvious characteristic points (such as house corner, road intersection, inflection point, etc.) of the ground layout target and the independent ground objects are adopted and evenly distributed in the survey area. For the ground points with high accuracy requirements, the principle of average value of multiple (at least three) measurements is adopted.            
Measurement method:            
In the test area, the control network is encrypted, and GPS static measurement and national high-level control network are used for joint measurement and calculation. During measurement, multiple GPS receivers conduct static synchronous observation at different stations, and the observation time is strictly in accordance with the control network measurement specifications.            
The ground points in the test area are accurately located. GPS-RTK positioning technology is used and the national high-level control points are used to calibrate to the local coordinate system. When the mobile station obtains the fixed solution during the coordinate acquisition, the measurement is carried out again and the single measurement lasts for 5S.            
Measuring position:            
(1) Flux observation matrix            
17 stations, Las tower, waternet, soilnet and bnunet nodes in the core area of flux observation matrix; ground control points in CASI flight area; ground corner reflector positions in radar coverage area; ground target positions in lidar flight area.            
(2) Hulugou small watershed            
Ground target location of lidar flight area.            
(3) Tianmuchi small watershed            
Ground target location of lidar flight area.            
(4) Dayokou Basin            
Satellite image geometric correction ground control point.            
Data format:            
GPS static survey, the original data format is ". Dat" and ". T01" (or ". T02") files (or converted renix data) and "field record". GPS-RTK survey, the original project is ". Job" file (or converted ". DC" file).            
The test results are submitted in the format of exported ". CSV" data, which can be viewed and edited by Excel software.            
Measurement time:            
June 19, 2012 to July 30, 2012
metadata.descriptionCn:
差分GPS定位测量目的是通过与国家高等级控制点坐标联测，使多个测区统一到相同坐标系下并实现精确绝对定位，在2000国家大地坐标系下，完成黑河中游通量观测矩阵、葫芦沟小流域、天姥池小流域和大野口流域观测系统和靶标的精确定位。为实现航空、航天光学影像和SAR影像及机载LiDAR数据的几何纠正和绝对定位，完成地面控制点的布设和高精度测量。其中中游区域，在东、南、西、北、中5个方向各联测1个国家高等级控制点。
测量仪器:
有TRIMBLE R8 GNSS系统3套。
测量原则：
对于控制网加密点，采用与测区外围四个象限的高等级已知点网状联接且均匀分布于测区。对于地面控制点（GCP），采用地面布设靶标与选取独立地物的明显特征点（如房屋角点，道路交点、拐点等）且均匀分布于测区。测量时对于精度要求高的地面点，采用分别测量多次（至少三次）求平均值的原则。
测量方法：
试验区控制网加密，采用GPS静态测量与国家高等级控制网进行联测并解算，测量时多台GPS接收机在不同测站上进行静止同步观测，其观测时间严格按照控制网测量规范。
试验区地面点精确定位，采用GPS-RTK定位技术并利用国家高等级控制点来校正到当地坐标系，坐标采集时等流动站获得固定解再进行测量且单次测量持续观测时间为5S。
测量位置:
（1）通量观测矩阵
通量观测矩阵核心区17个站点、LAS塔、WATERNET、SoilNET、BNUNET节点；CASI飞行区域地面控制点；雷达覆盖区域地面角反射器位置；激光雷达飞行区地面靶标位置。
（2）葫芦沟小流域
激光雷达飞行区地面靶标位置。
（3）天姥池小流域
激光雷达飞行区地面靶标位置。
（4）大野口流域
卫星影像几何校正地面控制点。
数据格式：
GPS静态测量，原始数据格式为“.DAT”和“.T01”（或“.T02”）文件（或转换的RENIX数据）和“外业记录”。GPS-RTK测量，原始项目为“.job”文件（或转换的“.dc”文件）。
该试验结果以导出“.csv”数据格式提交，该文件可用Excel软件查看与编辑。
测量时间：
2012-6-19至2012-7-30

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What instruments are used for GPS positioning in ecological hydrology remote sensing experiments?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在生态水文学遥感实验中，用于GPS定位的仪器有哪些？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'GPS-RTK positioning technology' mean in the context of ecological hydrology remote sensing experiments?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在生态水文学遥感实验的背景下，“GPS-RTK定位技术”是什么意思。
Definition.AnswerEn: GPS-RTK positioning technology refers to a method used for precise location measurement of ground points in ecological hydrology remote sensing experiments. It utilizes real-time kinematic (RTK) GPS technology to achieve high accuracy by correcting positions with reference to national high-grade control points and local coordinate systems. The process involves obtaining a fixed solution at a flow station and measuring with an observation duration of 5 seconds per measurement.
Definition.AnswerCn: GPS-RTK定位技术是指在生态水文遥感实验中用于精确测量地面点位置的一种方法。它利用实时动态（RTK）GPS技术，通过参考国家高等级控制点和地方坐标系统来实现高精度。该过程涉及在流动站获取固定解，并以每次测量5秒的观测持续时间进行测量。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the need for precise absolute positioning in the context of ecological and hydrological remote sensing experiments?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在生态和水文遥感实验中，精确绝对定位的需求受到以下因素的影响：
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The need for precise absolute positioning in ecological and hydrological remote sensing experiments is driven by the requirement to unify multiple survey areas under the same coordinate system and achieve accurate absolute positioning. This is crucial for the geometric correction and absolute positioning of optical and SAR imagery from aviation and aerospace, as well as airborne LiDAR data. Precise positioning ensures the accurate placement of observation systems and targets, such as flux observation matrices, and ground control points for satellite imagery correction. It also allows for the synchronization of measurement stations and the calibration of local coordinate systems using high-grade national control points.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在生态和水文遥感实验中，对精确绝对定位的需求源于将多个调查区域统一到同一坐标系统下的要求，并实现准确的绝对定位。这对于航空和航天的光学和合成孔径雷达（SAR）影像的几何校正和绝对定位，以及机载激光雷达（LiDAR）数据至关重要。精确定位确保了观测系统和目标（如通量观测矩阵和卫星影像校正的地面控制点）的准确放置。它还允许测量站的同步以及利用高等级国家控制点对地方坐标系统进行校准。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary goal of utilizing differential GPS positioning measurements for data collection in ecological hydrology remote sensing experiments?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在生态水文学遥感实验中，利用差分GPS定位测量进行数据收集的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary goal of utilizing differential GPS positioning measurements is to achieve precise absolute positioning by integrating coordinates with national high-level control points, ensuring that multiple survey areas are unified under the same coordinate system. This precise positioning enables accurate geometric correction and absolute positioning of airborne, spaceborne optical imagery, SAR imagery, and airborne LiDAR data, which is crucial for the ecological hydrology remote sensing experiments in the Heihe River Basin.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 利用差分GPS定位测量的主要目标是通过将坐标与国家高等级控制点结合，实现精确的绝对定位，确保多个测量区域统一在同一坐标系统下。这种精确定位使得对空中、太空光学影像、合成孔径雷达影像和空中激光雷达数据进行准确的几何校正和绝对定位成为可能，这对于黑河流域的生态水文遥感实验至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures and instruments are used to ensure precise absolute positioning for GPS measurements in ecological hydrology remote sensing experiments?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在生态水文学遥感实验中，确保GPS测量精确绝对定位所使用的程序和仪器有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To ensure precise absolute positioning, the GPS measurements utilize TRIMBLE R8 GNSS systems. The procedures include integrating multiple survey areas into the same coordinate system by linking them to national high-grade control point coordinates. The control network is densified using GPS static measurements synchronized across different stations, adhering to control network measurement standards. For ground control points, GPS-RTK positioning technology is used, calibrated with national high-grade control points, while the data collection occurs when the mobile station achieves a fixed solution and lasts for 5 seconds.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了确保精确的绝对定位，GPS测量采用TRIMBLE R8 GNSS系统。程序包括将多个测量区域整合到同一坐标系统中，通过连接到国家高等级控制点坐标来实现。控制网络通过在不同站点之间同步的GPS静态测量进行加密，遵循控制网络测量标准。对于地面控制点，使用GPS-RTK定位技术，经过国家高等级控制点的校准，数据收集在移动站点达到固定解并持续5秒时进行。
